citation.abstract: We report here the whole-genome sequence of six clinical isolates of influenza A(H1N1)pdm09, isolated from Kerala, India. Amino acid analysis of all gene segments from the A(H1N1)pdm09 isolates obtained in 2014 and 2015 identified several new mutations compared to the 2009 A(H1N1) pandemic strain.
citation.title: Whole-Genome Sequences of Influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 Virus Isolates from Kerala, India
